title: Masthead
reference-overview: The Masthead is denoted by the blue background area. It is used in conjunction with the Navigation Bar. It's main function is to provide a branding element to the overall Product Header.
reference-usage: The Masthead should always be used in when the Product Header is used as the main navigation option.
reference-details:
The Masthead should always include the product name. In addition, it can also support the following as baseline configurations:

  • Product Logo
  • Company/Client Logo
  • User Identifier
reference-mobile:
In the mobile verion of the Masthead, the following will occur:

  • The Product Name will decrease in font size but it will always be displayed.
  • The Product Logo, if used, will not display.
  • The User Identifier, if used, will be removed from the initial display and will be accessible by tapping the Menu icon.
  • The Company Logo, if used, will not display.
reference-example-version-label-2: Product Logo & Product Name & User Identifier
reference-example-version-label-3: Product Logo & Product Name & Company Logo
